trait.name: Amphibious
text: The miremal can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
text: The miremal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Savage Move
text: If the miremal surprises a creature, it gets a bonus action it can use on its first turn of combat for a claw attack, a bite attack, or a Bog Spew attack.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The miremal makes two attacks, one of which must be a claw attack.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Bog Spew (Recharge 5-6)
text: The miremal spews a noxious stream of bog filth mixed with stomach acid at a target up to 20 feet away. Target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1d4 rounds.

reaction.name: Muddled Escape (1/Day)
text: If an attack would reduce the miremal's hit points to 0, it collapses into a pool of filth-laden swamp water and its hit points are reduced to 1 instead. The miremal can move at its normal speed in this form, including moving through spaces occupied by other creatures. As a bonus action at the beginning of the miremal's next turn, it can reform, still with 1 hit point.
